verses.roman:
āmā ha-ite ānandita haya tribhuvana
āmāke ānanda dibe--aiche kon jana

synonyms: āmā ha-ite—from Me; ānandita—pleased; haya—becomes; tri-bhuvana—all the three worlds; āmāke—unto Me; ānanda dibe—will give pleasure; aiche—such; kon jana—what person.
translation: "All the world derives pleasure from Me. Is there anyone who can give Me pleasure?
